Name: boom faster
About the game: 'Forza Yang' is a classic Whac-A-Mole game. Instead of using a hammer, the player needs to shoot down the enemies that show up with limited time. The game has 4 different themes in total: Western, Private, City, and Sci-Fi. Each theme will have 4 different maps with increasing hard levels. There are also two extra mini-games.
